title: Installation issue: BBCP
body:
Hello everyone

I was trying to install bbcp through Spack. but unfortunately, it is showing the following error message. 

Cloning into 'bbcp'...
fatal: dumb http transport does not support --depth
lib/spack/spack/stage.py:501 ==> [2021-07-21-01:23:41.431691] ProcessError: Command exited with status 128:
    '/usr/bin/git' '-c' 'advice.detachedHead=false' 'clone' '--branch' 'master' '--single-branch' '--depth' '1' 'https://www.slac.stanford.edu/~abh/bbcp/bbcp.git'
lib/spack/spack/stage.py:487 ==> [2021-07-21-01:23:41.432297] Fetching from https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/git/~abh/bbcp/bbcp.git/master.tar.gz failed.
lib/spack/spack/stage.py:487 ==> [2021-07-21-01:23:41.432593] Fetching from https://mirror.spack.io/bbcp/bbcp-master.tar.gz failed.
lib/spack/spack/stage.py:487 ==> [2021-07-21-01:23:41.432933] Fetching from [git] https://www.slac.stanford.edu/~abh/bbcp/bbcp.git on branch master failed.
lib/spack/spack/error.py:54 ==> [2021-07-21-01:23:41.444783] Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed

/home/NCAOR/venkat/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1379, in do_fetch:
       1376
       **1377        self.stage.create()
       1378        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
  >>   1379        start_time = time.time()
       1380        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1381        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1382**


### Steps to reproduce the issue
$ spack install bbcp
...

Can someone help me sort out the issue.

Many thanks

Venkat

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- 

- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers

- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
